short_summary: \\n\nThis Bid Solicitation is issued against the TASK Based Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS, Stream 5.14 \\\u2014 Integrated logistics support specialist. The Department of National Defence (DND), Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), requires the services of one (1) Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Specialist to provide professional services to assist the Aerospace and Telecommunications Engineering Support Squadron (ATESS) to analyze and revise aircraft preventive maintenance programs and to facilitate the Aircraft Maintenance Performance Management Program (AMPMP).\\\\n

full_summary:
Government of Canada Tender Notice
**Project Title**: W3474-230024 TSPS Integrated Logistics Support Specialist
**Reference Number**: WS3982980440-Doc3992869397
**Public Posting Date**: May 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
### Important Notice:
The original posting indicated an incorrect closing time, and the correct closing deadline has been reinstated. Bids must be submitted by May 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT to be considered responsive. Any submissions made after this time will be considered non-conformant.

### Project Overview:
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of an Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Specialist to provide specialized expertise in analyzing and revising aircraft preventive maintenance programs and facilitating the Aircraft Maintenance Performance Management Program (AMPMP). This requirement is part of the TASK Based Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS, Stream 5.14 — Integrated logistics support specialist.

### Eligibility Criteria:
To be eligible for this opportunity, contractors must be part of the PWGSC TASK Based Professional Services (TSPS) SA Suppliers under E60ZT-18TSPS and meet specific Tier 1 and consultant category, security level, and level of expertise requirements.

### Key Dates:
- **Public Posting Date:** May 3, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** May 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 15, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** none specified

### Procurement Details:
- **Procurement Category:** Service
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
- **Most Relevant Commodity Code (UNSPSC):**
  - Educational support services
  - Curriculum development service
  - Educational forecasting service
- **Geographic Areas Applicable:** Trenton, Ontario
- **Several trade agreements are applicable, as listed in the procurement details.

### Contact Information:
Those interested in viewing the tender documents or purchasing relevant material should visit the publicly available reference URL listed below. All communications regarding this tender should be directed through the identified contact point:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16164126?extsite
